oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Embroidered postcard "Souvenir de France 1918" sent to Ruby Carter from Roy Carter
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This embroidered postcard includes portions of the flags of the allies within the numerals. The flags include: Great Britain, Italy (France), the United States, and Belgium. The postcard was mailed from Sgt. Roy Carter, an African-American soldier, to Ruby Carter and is addressed "Dear Folks." Roy served in the 158th Depot Brig. and later Co. D, 520th Engineers Service Battn. His note describes the snow and his desire to describe the sites he has seen, but such desriptions were prohibited.
